channel.title: Please help with webclient
channel.description:
Hello. I have made a webclient for my PI client and everything is fine except animations. Client is not showing any animation at all. Guess i need to change paths just i cant find where. This is the error what I'm getting: [code]java.lang.NullPointerException at Class36.method531(Class36.java:121) at Model.method470(Model.java:891) at EntityDef.method164(EntityDef.java:154) at NPC.method450(NPC.java:21) at NPC.getRotatedModel(NPC.java:28) at Animable.method443(Animable.java:10) at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1436) at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1036) at client.method146(client.java:13679) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9068) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9904) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5580)[/code]
Thank you!
